content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello, Hassan Rahman. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the 25 square meters apartment?

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also reasonably priced. Considering the size and location of the apartment, I would expect to pay somewhere around 750 Euro per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hmm, 750 Euro per month is an interesting offer. It's certainly a starting point for our negotiation. Would you be willing to negotiate on this price?

content: Certainly, Mister Heine. I am open to discussing a lower price. The condition of the apartment and any additional amenities could also influence my final decision. How much flexibility do you have on the price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to strike a balance between what I consider a fair price and what the market can bear. name: Heinrich Heine
